svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_12_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/68.0.3440.106 Safari/537.36" version="9.1.0" editor="www.draw.io"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 185px; max-width: 568px; width: 568px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

p.font: DAG representation of the 5 task workflow used in this activity. The circles represent tasks, each labeled with a task name and the amount of floating point operations (Flop) it takes to complete. The rectangles represent input and output files used or produced by each task. Each file is labeled with a file name and size.
